metadata.name: Pixlverse Founder's Pass
metadata.description: The Pixlverse Founder's Pass shows everyone you have been a supporter from the very beginning. Founder's Passes will confer incredible benefits to holders in a number of exciting ways that will evolve over time. Potential utility within the Pixlverse includes: in-game avatar special effects and cosmetics, access to exclusive Pixlverse NFTs, benefits to your Pixel Pet team and breeding capabilities, increased DeFi farming rewards and other future use cases as the Pixlverse grows.
